name: MemberInvoker
documentation:
Abstraction for invoking a {@link Member} (e.g. {@link java.lang.reflect.Method}, {@link java.lang.reflect.Constructor}, or {@link java.lang.reflect.Field}) reflectively.

This interface provides a uniform API to invoke members on a target object with zero or more parameters.

See {@link DefaultMemberInvoker} for the main implementation which uses high-performance invocation strategies using method handles and lambdas as opposed to traditional Java reflection resulting in near-native invocation performance.
